name: Nuke Design System
tagline: Element-first design system with fully extractable, editable theme files

Three design philosophies in one (minimal, subtle, all-in)
Lit web components - TypeScript DX, tiny runtime
benefits: Native HTML elements work out of the box
Extract ENTIRE theme folder - edit freely, updates never overwrite
